title: Add complete admin panel with user management and access control

requirements.text: Create a new admin menu component that provides navigation to user data management, access control (block/unblock users), and other administrative functions

quotes: crie um menu copleto onde posso ter acesso a dados de usuario,bloquerar e desbloquear acessos entre outras funções de administrador

acceptanceCriteria: Admin menu is accessible only to authenticated administrators
Menu displays clear navigation options for all admin functions
Menu follows the existing application design system with OKLCH colors and Tailwind styling

requirements.text: Implement backend admin role authorization system to restrict admin functions to authorized users only
acceptanceCriteria: Admin role is assigned and verified at the backend level
Non-admin users cannot access admin functions
Admin status is returned with user profile data

requirements.text: Create a user data management page that displays a list of all users with their profile information (name, email, registration date, and current status)

quotes: posso ter acesso a dados de usuario

acceptanceCriteria: Backend provides a query function to retrieve all user profiles for admins
Frontend displays user data in a table or card layout with search and filter capabilities
User data includes name, email, registration timestamp, and account status

requirements.text: Implement user access blocking functionality that allows admins to block a user's access to the application
acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores user blocked status and enforces access restrictions
Admin can block a user through the frontend interface
Blocked users receive an appropriate error message when attempting to access the application
Block action includes a reason field for documentation

requirements.text: Implement user access unblocking functionality that allows admins to restore access for previously blocked users
acceptanceCriteria: Admin can unblock a user through the frontend interface
Unblocked users immediately regain full access to the application
Unblock action is logged for audit purposes

requirements.text: Add admin dashboard statistics showing total users, blocked users, active users, and recent user registrations
acceptanceCriteria: Backend calculates and returns user statistics
Admin dashboard displays key metrics with visual indicators
Statistics update in real-time when user status changes

requirements.text: Create an admin activity log page that displays recent administrative actions (blocks, unblocks, and other admin operations) with timestamps and admin identities
acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores admin actions in an audit log
Frontend displays audit log with filtering by action type and date range
Each log entry includes timestamp, admin principal, action type, and affected user

requirements.text: Add admin route protection to ensure all admin pages and components are only accessible to users with admin privileges
acceptanceCriteria: Admin routes redirect non-admin users to the main dashboard
Admin navigation items are hidden from non-admin users
Unauthorized access attempts display appropriate error messages

constraints: Admin functionality must not break existing user flows for block reports, work history, and legal defense generation
Admin authorization must be enforced at the backend level, not just in the UI
User blocking must not delete user data, only restrict access
nonGoals: Admin role delegation or multi-level admin permissions
